page.title: 13A Day in My Life
page.content: On Sunday 2nd June I got up, got dressed and made my bed. After break- fast Dad went out and Mum said that we would go to the allotments. When we got there I saw my neighbours and I went off with them. They were recording the songs of birds on their tape recorder. We went down to the stream and crossed over it. We went along the side and we got scratched and stung from the net- tles and brambles. Then we came to a clump of tall nettles. The younger of the two brothers decided to climb up the fence and jump over the nettles. After he had gone over there was a SPLASH! I said that I thought he had fallen in the stream. We went through the nettles and pulled him out. After lunch I went into my garden and did some sunbathing. Later I went in and read a book, had tea and went to bed. Ellen Derrick, Marian Vian.
